video.title: Splatalot
video.synopsis: Teenage contestants compete on an extreme, medieval obstacle course, playing against the clock and a team of gladiators for possession of the castle.

episodes.synopsis: Attackers do impressions of animals and Thorne while crossing the moat. Vane, the defender of the moat, falls asleep, and Matt conks out in the shack.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: An attacker does an impression of a seal and inspires Skabb and Jason; Matt dreams that no one will be named the new ruler of Splatalot.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Hosts Matt and Jason receive praise from Castle-Savvy magazine; Emcee MC and DJ Jay return to show everyone why "rhymin’ just ain’t easy."
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: The girls square off against the boys for the coveted crown, while Jason and Matt battle to see who gets the hotly contested title of "Co-Host #1."
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: A new group of attackers storms the castle; Skabb gives an impromptu Spanish lesson as Madeva confuses Spain with Mexico; Matt tries to grow a beard.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Brave new attackers, including ninjas, dragons and contortionists, storm the castle; Matt ignores Jason until he will accept Matt's new nickname.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: A new group of daredevil attackers, including a Star Trek fan, a country music fan and a bar mitzvah boy, arrive, intent on becoming the new rulers.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Teams of parents and kids compete to capture the crown and be named the new rulers of the kingdom; Jason and Matt's fathers co-host.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: A new group of attackers lay claim to the crown, as one claims to be the new owner of the castle -- where Matt’s mischief-loving Nana is on the loose.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: A new group of attackers includes a track star, a princess, and a Frexican as Matt and Jason call the action and use TV magic to color the commentary.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Skabb, Thorne and Faetal taunt an attacker with Scottish trash talk, and cheerleaders help Jason and Matt embrace their inner Splat spirit.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Dance fever infects the kingdom as new attackers attempt to cross the moat, ditch the dungeon and capture the crown. Only Matt is completely immune.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: New attackers include one who admires American President Barack Obama and another who uses creepy voices; Matt moonlights as the castle handyman.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: In an epic Nation Vs. Nation Splatdown, patriotic teens represent their homelands as they storm the castle; Matt establishes a new nation of his own.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: A verbal sparring match between Thorne and an attacker creates extra tension on the moat; Vane sets up his kitchen and serves up some Key Slime Pie.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: An attacker who is a big fan of Michael Jackson tries to cross the moat; the defenders play the pun game; Matt fears that the castle is haunted.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Insipred by an attacker who built his own computer, Matt tries to build one; an attacker who is a model auditions to be on a magazine cover.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: There is mystery afoot when the highly coveted crown of Splatalot goes missing; Madeva catches a cold but shows her grit defending the kingdom.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: The one day of the year when Matt does his laundry causes him to make some unusual wardrobe choices; new attackers who love food storm the castle.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: The new attackers include magicians, skateboarders, snowboarders and one who was named after an Egyptian princess; Matt works on his bucket list.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: An attacker’s battle cry inspires Jason and Matt to imagine themselves as superheroes; Skabb makes a surprise visit to the Splatproof Shack.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Five pairs of twins take on the castle and its defenders; Matt’s twin, Tam, returns, and three of the defenders reveal that they too have twins.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Five teams of best friends attack the castle; Matt reveals that he and Jason are just work buddies, and Jason tries to win Matt’s friendship.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Matt double-parks his car and tries to speed up the show to avoid penalty; the Splakken claims victims; a new attacker's approach confuses Kookaburra.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Five teachers and five students battle it out for Splatalot supremacy; Skabb auditions on the moat for the lead in "Splatalot: The Musical."
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Five teams of courageous parents and kids attack the castle, going up against the dastardly defenders; a UFO appears, and aliens abduct Jason.
episodes.title: Episode 26
